name: Krok'quizz
description:
Krok' Quizz is a quizz party game on the universe of dofus where you are on the krok krok island.
To answer the question you must look everywhere, the decors should be the reply. Or just be as stupid as the krok krok.
This was created during a game jam with l'atelier du jeu vidéo, Human academy and the participation of Ankama
-----------------------------
The team:
Atelier du jeu vidéo (me) (programming, game design)
-----------------------------
Human academy (2d artist, animator, game design)

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/artwork/mqbmo9
